vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βαρι-ησοῦς, -οῦ, ὁ (Aram. בַּר־יֵשׁוּעַ, son of Joshua),
Bar-Jesus: Act.13:6 (see: Ἐλύμας).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.13.6
§ Bar-Jesus, "son of Jesus [Joshua]"
Bar-Jesus,, (Proper name), Acts 13:6*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴耶穌 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在亞蘭文的意思是 "耶穌 (耶書亞) 的兒子"
一個假先知 (徒 13:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴耶稣 这个阳性专有名词 人名在亚兰文的意思是 "耶稣 (耶书亚) 的儿子"
一个假先知 (徒 13:6)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ba-giê-su «con của Giê-su » một thầy pháp.
